footer.poweredBy: Powered by React, Tailwind CSS, and Google Gemini

login.tagline: Sign in to manage your collection
login.recoverySent: If an account exists for this email, a recovery link has been sent.
login.mfaPrompt: Please enter the code from your authenticator app to complete your sign-in.
login.errorInvalidMfa: Invalid authentication code. Please try again.
login.signupSuccess: Your account has been created. Please check your email for a confirmation link to activate your account.

uploader.title: Upload Your Collection
uploader.description: Take photos of your games and consoles, and let AI do the rest.

scanner.loader: AI is analyzing your collection... this may take a moment.
scanner.errorGeneric: An unknown error occurred. Please try a different image.
scanner.errorEmpty: The AI returned an empty response. The image might not contain recognizable games or consoles.
scanner.errorJson: The AI failed to provide a valid JSON response. The image might be unclear or contain no recognizable items.
scanner.freeTierLimit: Upgrade to a Lite or Premium plan to use the AI scanner.
scanner.liteTierLimit: You have used all your AI scans for this month. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited scans.
scanner.scansRemaining: You have {count} AI scans remaining this month.

scanResults.title: Scan Results
scanResults.noItemsFound: No items were identified in the uploaded images.
scanResults.confirmClearAllMessage: This will remove all uploaded images and clear the scan results. Are you sure?

collection.title: My Collection ({count})
collection.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your collection?
collection.noMatch: No items match your current filters.
collection.empty: Your collection is empty. Use the Scanner to add items!
collection.importDesc: Upload a CSV file to add items to your collection.
collection.importDrop: Drag & drop a CSV file here or
collection.importFormat: Must follow the format from the CSV export.
collection.noDuplicatesFound: No duplicates were found in your collection.
collection.duplicatesError: An error occurred while removing duplicates.
collection.updatePricesSuccess: All prices have been successfully updated.
collection.updatePricesError: An error occurred while updating prices.

wishlist.title: My Wishlist ({count})
wishlist.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your wishlist?
wishlist.noMatch: No items match your current filters.
wishlist.empty: Your wishlist is empty. Use the Scanner to add items!

analytics.title: Collection Analytics
analytics.description: An overview of your video game collection.
analytics.emptyDesc: Your collection is empty. Add items via the Scanner to see your stats!
analytics.chartNoData: No data available for this chart.

csv.errorInvalidHeaders: CSV must contain at least the required headers.
csv.errorParse: Failed to parse CSV file. Please check the format.
csv.errorNoValidItems: No valid items found in the CSV file. Please check the format.

db.fetchError: Failed to fetch data from the database. Please check your connection and try again.

account.title: My Account
account.description: Manage your account settings and security.
account.subscriptionDescription: You are currently on the {plan} plan.
account.passwordSuccessLogout: Password updated! You will be logged out for security.
account.passwordError: Failed to update password. If 2FA is enabled, the code may be incorrect.
account.passwordConfirmMfaMessage: To protect your account, please enter your 2FA code to confirm this change.
account.mfaDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
account.mfaDisableConfirm: To disable 2FA, please enter a valid code from your authenticator app. This will reduce your account security.
account.mfaSetupStep1: 1. Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy).
account.mfaSetupStep2: Or enter this secret key manually:
account.mfaSetupStep3: 2. Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify.
account.mfaError: Failed to verify code. Please try again.
account.mfaErrorDisable: Failed to disable 2FA. The provided code may be incorrect.

passwordPolicy.title: Password must contain:
passwordPolicy.validationError: Password does not meet all the policy requirements.

account.plansDescription: Unlock more features and remove limits by upgrading your plan.

authFlows.emailConfirmedMessage: Your account has been successfully verified. You can now sign in and start managing your collection.
authFlows.passwordResetDescription: Enter a new, secure password for your account.
authFlows.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

home.heroTitle: Catalog Your Video Game Collection Instantly
home.heroSubtitle: Use the power of AI to scan, identify, and inventory your entire collection. Get detailed info and real-time price estimates with just a photo.
home.feature1Desc: Snap a photo of your games, and our AI instantly identifies titles, consoles, and accessories, saving you hours of manual entry.
home.feature2Desc: Automatically get rich details for each item, including platform, release year, publisher, and physical condition.
home.feature3Desc: Stay up-to-date with current market values from multiple online marketplaces to understand the worth of your collection.
home.feature4Desc: Easily organize what you own and keep a separate list of the games and hardware you're looking for.
home.pricingDescription: Choose a plan that fits the size of your collection and your needs.
home.contactDesc: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
home.contactSuccess: Thanks for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
home.contactError: An error occurred. Please try again later.

collection.title: Collection Limit Reached
collection.message: You have reached the {limit} item limit for your collection. Please upgrade your plan to add more.

wishlist.title: Wishlist Limit Reached
wishlist.message: You have reached the {limit} item limit for your wishlist. Please upgrade your plan to add more.
